name: BomBun
description:
THE CLOCK IS TICKING

Bombs have been mysteriously placed in every room within a building and are set to explode in 10 seconds. Who set them? Why do they intend on demolishing this building? What do they hope to achieve?

There is no time to ponder these questions, as you are still inside!

Each room has a locked door, and it's your job to rummage each room to look for the key to escape to safety. Careful! There may be nasty surprises within each room's containers. The bombs won't wait for a bumbling bunny, so you better get moving!

  • RACE the clock in 10 tricky rooms.
  • AVOID traps meant to trip you up.
  • DASH with the super shoes to quickly find the key.
  • TEST your skill with Random Mode, where the key's location is randomized.

Originally developed for Ludum Dare 27, where the theme was "10 seconds". 

Music by Ted Kerr (Wolfgang).

Window size can be adjusted by pressing W at the title screen.
